subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The University of Memphis is responding to an N.C.A.A. notice of allegations accusing the men’s program of major violations during the 2007-8 season under John Calipari, The Commercial Appeal newspaper reported on its Web site. The allegations include “knowing fraudulence or misconduct” on an SAT exam by a player on that season’s team, which finished runner-up in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
